n, m = map(int, input().split())

foods = [0] * m
for _ in range(n):
    k = list(map(int, input().split()))
    for i in k[1:]:
        foods[i-1] += 1

print(foods.count(n))

n, m = map(int, input().split())

# list of lists
likes = [[] for _ in range(n)]

for i in range(n):
    likes[i] = list(map(int, input().split()))

# print(likes)

# set of sets
likes_set = [set() for _ in range(n)]

for i in range(n):
    likes_set[i] = set(likes[i][1:])

# print(likes_set)

# set intersection
intersection = set.intersection(*likes_set)

# print(intersection)

print(len(intersection))

# input
N, M = map(int, input().split())
likes = [list(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(N)]

# initialize
liked_by_all = [0] * M

# count
for i in range(N):
    for j in range(1, likes[i][0] + 1):
        liked_by_all[likes[i][j] - 1] += 1

# output
print(liked_by_all.count(N))

import sys

N, M = map(int, input().split())

# Initialize the list of foods
foods = [0] * M

# Count the number of people who like each food
for i in range(N):
    K = int(input().split()[0])
    for j in range(K):
        foods[int(input().split()[0]) - 1] += 1

# Print the number of foods liked by all the N people
print(foods.count(N))

N, M = map(int, input().split())

foods = [0] * M

for i in range(N):
    K = int(input().split()[0])
    for j in range(K):
        foods[int(input().split()[0]) - 1] += 1

print(foods.count(N))
